WorkItem.Description:
When running in Mono, 8-bit image transparency does not work (.gif files in this case). This makes using the talent tree viewer difficult (but not impossible) to use. As you can see in the attached screenshot, the talent icon overlay graphic totally covers the actual talent image. Arrows (not shown in screenshot) also lack transparency and look funky.
 
=== SOLUTION ===
Converting the overlay and arrow images to PNG32 files (I used ImageMagick) and updating the file names in /Properties/Resources.resx fixes it.
 
Note: If you use Imagemagick to convert them, it must be set to output PNG32 files (prepend "PNG32:" to the output filename) else it will automatically make some files 8-bit which will not work.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mono] Talent window decoration transparency does not work. [Fix Included]

Comments.Message: This is obsoleted by Rawr3; won't be making any changes.
